entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 05:50 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
